features.on: time - step dimension and the feature vector dimension

Bidirectional Long Short - Term Memory N.from sentence: Above all , this paper proposes Bidirectional Long Short - Term Memory Networks with Two - Dimensional Max Pooling ( BLSTM - 2DPooling ) to capture features on both the time - step dimension and the feature vector dimension .
It first utilizes Bidirectional Long Short - Term Memory Networks ( BLSTM ) to transform the text into vectors .

2D max pooling operation.from sentence: And then 2D max pooling operation is utilized to obtain a fixed - length vector .

2D convolution ( BLSTM - 2DCNN ).from sentence: This paper also applies 2D convolution ( BLSTM - 2DCNN ) to capture more meaningful features to represent the input text .
